document.full_text: fuel shortages, icy rain and power outages are hampering japan's worst humanitarian crisis since world war two, but relief workers are reporting some progress as mangled roads are reopened and new homes built.
document.title: icy rain, fuel shortages hamper relief to quake-hit japan
lines_and_colors: fuel shortages, icy rain and power outages are hampering japan's worst humanitarian crisis since world war two, but relief workers are reporting some progress as mangled roads are reopened and new homes built.
